Name: DEV - Implement Back button on Registration page
Notes:
Hi team, 

Event Name: https:// https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2527
Event ID: 2527

The client has raised this feedback and we are seeking help if we can -
Add a “Back” button on our online registration page to allow users to easily return to previous steps during the ticket purchasing process. 
This enhancement aims to improve the user journey by enabling visitors to correct errors (e.g., misspelt names, incorrect emails, or wrong mobile numbers) without restarting the entire process. Additionally, this feature should help reduce customer service queries related to updating visitor details.

 Visibility:
 • The “Back” button is clearly visible and accessible on all steps of the registration process where applicable.
 Functionality:
 • Clicking the “Back” button returns the user to the immediately preceding step without losing any previously entered data.
 • The transition does not cause any unexpected behavior or errors.
 • Users are able to modify any information on the previous pages once they navigate back.
 
Additional Notes:
 • This feature is expected to enhance the overall registration experience and decrease the volume of support tickets concerning detail updates.
 
Thank you so much,

Name: Create StoreTheme & StoreThemeToken table
Notes:
StoreTheme
-----------
Id (PK)
Name
CssTemplateVersion (int)

StoreThemeToken
----------------
Id (PK)
TicketThemeId
Key            nvarchar(200)
Value          nvarchar(max)


-- Create StoreTheme table
IF OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.StoreTheme', N'U') IS NULL
BEGIN
    CREATE TABLE dbo.StoreTheme (
        Id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,
        Name NVARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
        CssTemplateVersion INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
        CreatedAt DATETIME2(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT SYSUTCDATETIME(),
        UpdatedAt DATETIME2(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT SYSUTCDATETIME()
    );
END
GO

-- Create StoreThemeToken table
IF OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.StoreThemeToken', N'U') IS NULL
BEGIN
    CREATE TABLE dbo.StoreThemeToken (
        Id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,
        StoreThemeId INT NOT NULL,
        [Key] NVARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
        [Value] NVARCHAR(MAX) NULL,
	Description VARCHAR(500) NULL,
        CreatedAt DATETIME2(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT SYSUTCDATETIME(),
        UpdatedAt DATETIME2(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT SYSUTCDATETIME()
    );
END
GO

-- Create index on StoreThemeToken(StoreThemeId)
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM sys.indexes
    WHERE name = N'IX_StoreThemeToken_StoreThemeId'
      AND object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.StoreThemeToken')
)
BEGIN
    CREATE INDEX IX_StoreThemeToken_StoreThemeId
    ON dbo.StoreThemeToken(StoreThemeId);
END
GO

Name: Customise Email Subjects per Product
Notes:
Situation
For events where people can register for delegate passes & gala dinners, the subject line for confirmation emails has to be the same per event or store.
When we are sending out reminder emails closer to event dates, clients ask if we can adjust the subject line of the email to be more specific to the ticket attached to get people's attention.

For example when sending out delegate pass reminder emails we might want "REMINDER: Delegate Pass Attached here"

Foe example when sending out gala dinner reminder email we might want "REMINDER: Gala Dinner Ticket Attached here"

Presently if we change the subject line, it changes across the whole event.

Solution
We need a way to edit the subject line of a confirmation email on a per product basis.
Is there a way we could create an event parameter that would allow us to customise the subject line of confirmation emails sent from Admin on a per product basis?

The event parameter would override the default subject line.

For example:
Product ID: 4444 | See below your tickets
Product ID: 5555 | Confirmation below of tickets

This would operate similar to how custom email templates are managed in event parameter.
https://Ticketing_Ticket_Product_Template

This request is being pushed hard by Steve Gibson from AMDA but would benefit so many other clients too.

Steve is going live with Indian Ocean in 3 weeks. Is this possible to achieve by then?

I put together a doc outlining all the emails and subject lines we can customise. The issue is not being able to do it on a per product basis.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uKAygrMaX0rSD5vooos3tSGKoq9Y7UCtEZVfcqRhlqg/edit?tab=t.0

Name: Permanent Solution for the apostrophes to be recognised in admin for when creating orders in admin
Notes:
At present, apostrophes are not recognised or accepted in Admin when creating orders. This creates issues with stand names that require them (for example, many stand names at PBC Events).

The current workaround is to remove the apostrophe, which results in inaccurate stand names and inconsistencies across records.

A permanent solution that ensures apostrophes are fully supported and recognised will:
    Improve accuracy of stand names
    Enhance user experience by removing the need for manual workarounds
    Ensure compliance with the actual and correct stand names

Expected Outcome
    Apostrophes are accepted and displayed correctly in Admin
    Stand names with apostrophes are stored and reported accurately
    Consistency is maintained across databases, exports, and outputs

Example:
https://admin.lup.com.au/Order/Index/680383
Directory Wording (Stand Name): Lil'Kooee
Stand Number: D03

Hey Team,
Just sharing this here as well as it relates to 2604 In-Cosmetics Global and stock.
We have an issue with stock controller.
It is counting based on all tickets regardless if they are verified or approved.
So we have had 1 session show as sold out online because 45 people have applied for it and have verification status, but it should only count based on 45 people being approved for the session.
Session in question: https://admin.lup.com.au/TicketProduct/EditTicketProduct/50486
Gem Stonem
https://lupevents.slack.com/team/U1ADZBH7D https://lupevents.slack.com/team/U0GD6JV7S Issue with stock.
This pack was showing as Sold Out online because 45 people had applied for this session. 45 People have verification status, none have been approved. Therefore the session should not show as sold out. It should only count stock based on 45 approved registrants not verified.
I have manually set the capacity to be 0 so the pack is no longer showing as sold out online.

Notes:
We want to keep track of the Referer HTTP Header for https://tickets.lup.com.au so that we can keep track of where the ticketing traffic came from.

eg We can then put it on universal report and also put it in a dashboard report to say "10,000 tickets came from facebook, 500 from linkedin etc)

Name: Gracefule DTS Answer count fallback
Notes:
if we hit the 200-answer limit for a ticket, please apply the following fallback logic. If the fallback fails, still throw the error.
Example:
Ticket 19543715 has 5839 answers, exceeding the allowed maximum of 200.
You can inspect using:

SELECT SurveyDeviceMode, SurveyTitle, SaveTime, ImportTime FROM Answer JOIN Survey ON Answer.SurveyID = Survey.SurveyID WHERE Barcode = '9314385' AND EventID = 2551 ORDER BY SurveyDeviceMode 


Fallback logic:
    Include all scans where SurveyDeviceMode != 5.
    For SurveyDeviceMode = 5, group by SurveyID and select the first and last scan per event day (UTC-adjusted using the same timezone logic we use in reporting).
    If the resulting set is ≤ 200, proceed. Otherwise, throw.

Name: 10% Discount Auto Apply for Ticket Qty 8+
Notes:
Hey Team,

The client has a discount strategy that is key to their marketing campaign.

For anyone who adds 8 or more tickets to their order, they would like the system to auto apply a 10% discount.

So:
If I select 7 tickets = no discount
If I select 8 tickets = 10% discount applied to total transaction

We need to consider the scenario that someone selects 8 tickets, the discount is applied, but then they remove some tickets and now have less than 8 tickets selected. The discount needs to disappear.

The 10% discount only applies if 8 or more $$$ value tickets are selected.
So if i select 6 x $$$ tickets & 2 x FREE tickets, the discount is not applied.

We need to consider the scenario that the client may still want to use other tracking links / embedded coupon codes, so we need to discuss what options we have around this working in conjunction with these type of codes.

Event | https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2674
https://tickets.lupevents.co.uk/the-podcast-show-london-2026?cat=cat-registration

The client wants to go live with ticketing on Wed 26th November.

We have set the expectation that this won't be ready by then.

We have advised 1st week of December, but if this can be ready sooner it would be really appreciated as we really want to wow this client being our first big client in the UK!

Name: DEV - Automatically add ADD-ON to Main Product - Industry Networking
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #33 20/11 to 26/11
Notes:
Similar to what was done in this card: https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1210040456905198/task/1211764297776345?focus=true

At AusCryptocon we have an issue around "double entitlements" and the way products have been set up.

There are some ticket types that INCLUDE access to an INDUSTRY NETWORKING EVENT.

The issue we face with the products that automatically include access to the industry night event is the inability to control access onsite.
If I have a VIP ticket, my entitlements need to allow me to re-enter the expo unlimited number of times. But when I attend the industry night, my ticket can only be scanned once, and the scanner needs to reject my ticket if it is attempted to be scanned again. (This is a concern for the client as they have a history of people taking screenshots of their tickets and sharing it with their friends)

So this card is to automatically add the industry night ADD-ON to the products that have it included so we can set entitlements on these add ons and control access onsite.

Noting here that this card is to bulk add the ADD ON to the products above to all orders previously purchased, and then to be an automatic process for any sales made after this card.

The event runs 21st - 23rd November.

Mapping File below:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yRjg9Z_Ph9vLs95M2wkA1IOxneBz1v-cPtwIWnDEN9I/edit?gid=1479072252#gid=1479072252

Name: DEV - Automatically add Extra to Main Products
Notes:
At AusCryptocon we have an issue around "double entitlements" and the way products have been set up.

There are some ticket types that INCLUDE access to a yacht party, whilst other ticketholders are able to add the yacht as an Extra.

The issue we face with the products that automatically include access to the yacht is the inability to control access onsite.
If I have a VIP ticket, my entitlements need to allow me to re-enter the expo unlimited number of times. But when I attend the yacht party, my ticket can only be scanned once, and the scanner needs to reject my ticket if it is attempted to be scanned again. (This is a concern for the client as they have a history of people taking screenshots of their tickets and sharing it with their friends)

So anyone with the yacht party add on, we can easily set the entitlements to be scanned once.

So this card is to automatically add the yacht party extra to the products that have yahct included so we can set entitlements on these add ons and control access onsite.

Below are the list of products and product IDs that need to have the yacht extra automatically added to their orders.

Mapping file
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yysCziLBJPSfnnqUKzYzP9NGWBkGXDPvtU1RfOmjNNo/edit?gid=0#gid=0

Product Name

49176

Below is the Yacht Party Extra product and ID to add.

Product ID

Noting here that this card is to bulk add the extra to the products above to all orders previously purchased, and then to be an automatic process for any sales made after this card.

The event runs 21st - 23rd November.

Name: DEV - Emperia QR CODES for Badge Printing
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request), BAU #25 24/9 to 30/9
Notes:
This event uses Emperia so we need to make sure badges print onsite with QR CODES are compatible with Emperia app

    Printing an online registration on iOS app should print this QR Code on the badge
    Printing on onsite registration on an iPad in iOS app should print this Emperia QR Code on badge
    The "BadgeID" in this badge should be the same badge ID as being sent to RX API. eg if Onsite registration on iPad uses Longcode then we should send Longcode to RX API
    Emperia badges should scan in via Ticket scanners, exhibitor scanners, session scanners
        Separate card https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1209750686998918/task/1210246109613147?focus=true

Name: IMPORTANT: Delete photos and ID's in S3 and system
Notes:
For various events like IMARC, IndoPacific, Sydney Royal Easter shows, the visitor may upload their Licence/Passport and then we might crop their photo

We are required to delete these from the system and want to do it to mimimise our security risk

    Delete the uploaded ID from S3
    Delete the cropped photo from S3
    Delete any other ID photos etc we may have stored of them
    Update their answerdetails record to be "Photo deleted for privacy"


ClientID
11108
16857
10902
are the most important one

For events that have FINISHED.


-- events to delete photos
-- Original photo, cropped photos, all photos

select event.eventID, event.clientID, eventcode, eventdatestart, epkey, epvalue  from EventParameters

         inner join event on event.eventId=EventParameters.eventID
         where
        (EventParameters.EPKey='Photo_ImageData_Question_ID'
        or epkey ='Photo_ImageURL_Question_ID')
         and eventdatefinish <='2025-10-20 00:00:00' --and eventdatestart <='2025-10-20 00:00:00'
         and eventcode not like '%demo%'
order by clientID, eventdatestart





-- list of photo ID answers in answerdetails table
SELECT
    visitor.visitorID, visitor.email, event.eventID, event.eventcode, epkey, epvalue,
    answerdetails.questiondetailsID,
    AnswerDetails.value, answerdetails.AnswerDetailStatus
FROM EventParameters
INNER JOIN Event     ON Event.eventId = EventParameters.eventID
INNER JOIN AnswerDetails     ON AnswerDetails.questiondetailsID = CAST(epvalue AS int)
inner join answer on answer.answerID=answerdetails.AnswerID
inner join visitor on answer.visitorID=visitor.visitorID
WHERE
    (--EventParameters.EPKey = 'Photo_ImageData_Question_ID' or
      EventParameters.EPKey = 'Photo_ImageURL_Question_ID')
    AND TRY_CAST(epvalue AS int) IS NOT NULL
    --AND Event.EventDateFinish <= '2025-10-31 00:00:00'
    --AND Event.EventDateStart <= '2025-10-31 00:00:00'
    AND Event.EventCode NOT LIKE '%demo%'
and visitor.eventID=event.eventID
ORDER BY Event.EventDateStart;

Name: SXSW Update product pdf template so Product should not print badge if no addon for pro pass and conference day pass
Notes:
For PRO PASS and CONFERENCE DAY PASSES if they don't have the addon selected it should not print the badge

There is a separate card that checks for the CONFERENCEPRO PASS addon product and chooses the template.

So if there is no addon of the pro-pass addons that means it will fall back to the main product's template. So we need to put a zzzz in front of the template PDF name in ticketproducts table and that means the print will fail which is what we want to happen.

These are the ones that are effected (I think)
select * from ticketproducts where ticketproductName like '%pro pass%' and ticketpackcategory = 'Standard' and eventId=2540

select * from ticketproducts where ticketproductName like '%conference day pass%' and ticketpackcategory = 'Standard' and eventId=2540

Name: MORE INFO SXSW DEV [WIP] - Upgrade Testing & Badgelines
Notes:
In SXSW people may be upgrading their packs. eg PRO PASS to PLATINUM etc

They can do this online using the ticket link and also could be done by customer service in Admin. 

https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2540

We want to ensure all forms of Upgrades work and prints correctly on the badge. Examples of scenarios:
    Online Upgrades https://tickets.lup.com.au/Upgrade/Get/2540?cat=CAT-UPGRADE e.g Upgrading from Pro Pass to Platinum
    Admin - Tickets https://admin.lup.com.au/Ticket e.g Updating Pack & Product
    Organiser Portal https://admin.lup.com.au/Organiser/Accreditation/Index/9eafea37-8f42-42e0-b191-3385e6f9eabd e.g Updating Pack & Product

Works means:
    Changing a pack and product updates in system in reasonable time
    Badge text updates in a reasonable time 
    Correct badge template is selected automatically
    When a pro-pass successfully upgrades to a PLATINUM the pro-pass specific addons need to be cancelled automatically.

Name: SXSW handling tickets that didn't select addons
Notes:
There are some ticket types eg pro-pass or day pass that MUST select addons

DONE: What is the process for reminding those who haven't selected addons
DONE: What is process onsite

Is there any easy way we can show this in console
For printing badges onsite:
    A DAY pass that didn't have the relevant add-on should not print a badge (and/or show a correct warning)
    A PRO pass that didn't have the relevant add-on should not print a badge (and/or show a correct warning)


select * from Tickets t
where t.eventid=2540 and ticketstatus='active'
and
exists (
select 1 from TicketOrderProducts p 
inner join TicketProducts pr on pr.ticketproductid = p.ticketproductid
where pr.eventid=2540 and
p.TicketID = t.ticketid and t.ticketpackid =p.TicketPackID and  TicketProductCode like '%pro pass%' and TicketProductCategory='Standard'
)
-- propass that doesnt have addon
and not  EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
     from TicketOrderProducts p 
inner join TicketProducts pr on pr.ticketproductid = p.ticketproductid
where pr.eventid=2540 and
p.TicketID = t.ticketid and  TicketProductCode like '%pro pass%' and TicketProductCategory='addon'
);

Name: DONE IMPORTANT: Enable and build ticket stream
Notes:
On this previous card https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1204858398617913/task/1211107833007064?focus=true we disabled auto-population of the ticketstream.

Once production team has finished their work of creating ticket surveys and adding/removing products, dev needs to:
    Enable auto-population of ticket stream
    Push all tickets to ticket stream in an orderly fashion so it populates each ticket survey correctly.

Re-enable it in both the https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/59794?eventID=2540 page and the ticket stream handler


-- push to ticketstream table, batch insert with interval time
select distinct TicketId, s.SurveyId
from SurveyTicketProducts p 
inner join Survey s on s.surveyid = p.surveyid
left join TicketOrderProducts pr on pr.TicketproductId = p.TicketProductId and pr.TicketorderProductStatus='Active'
where s.eventid=2540 and surveystatus='active'

Notes:
Hi Team, 

ARBS a new client and have a different registration journey in mind as opposed to the standard. If this set up is possible.
Admin - https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2605
Aiming to get registration ready by end of October ready for launch in November.

Page 1 - Landing Page 
Page 2 - Registration of the main ticket
Page 3 - Seminars (about 80 seminars that will be integrated via API from MapYourShow to LUP)
Page 4 - Industry Awards/Gala dinner (with Dietary Restriction question)

So currently, to allow multiple transactions, Gala placed as an Extra. The client wants the Seminar and Awards to be consecutive pages and Gala dinner tickets include Single Ticket and Table of 10. 

Details from client on regarding Awards that may be essential in deciding options :
1. Should there be a marker on an attendee's name badge that is printed onsite that indicates they are attending the Gala Dinner? 
No, they don’t wear their badges to the dinner as it is a formal occasion.
2. Do you need to know the names of everyone attending the dinner? E.g. if someone purchases a table of 10, do you need to know the individual names of the 10 people attending the dinner?
No, they usually don’t know who is on their table / guests till closer to the event. We follow up with them directly.
3. How are you planning on managing table and seat allocation for the gala dinner? 
We do this manually
4. In addition to question 3, should there be any details passed back to the visitor about which table / seat number that have been allocated?
No, if they ask we just email them personally
5. How have you managed dinner tickets previously? For example, have attendee's had a separate ticket for the dinner or is it included in their main registration ticket?
The dinner is always sold separately. We have used other booking platforms in the past such as try booking but we wanted it all in one place

Name: Export session data for all theatre scanners
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #29 22/10 to 28/10
Notes:
This needs to be done on the date (which is Monday morning after show finishes)

Same as task from previous event https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1209011524724058/task/1210479786229091?focus=true

Admin Link https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2602

Extract the data from https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/59897, https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/59899 and https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/59900 session scanners to confirm scan start and finish times, tag with session codes and then import this back into Universal Report. 
Note: we need the exported file to include NULL data

Example query for Dev

-- Export Theatre scans and also include ticket order data, and allow for unregistered visitors
-- 1328 / 18968 / 18967
-- Theatre scanner export - de-duplicate

-- Export a list of visitors who scanned in theatres at an event
-- Note the surveyttitle where clauses is like '%session%'  change as required
declare @surveyID integer
declare @eventID integer
declare @OffSet integer

-- Set @surveyID = 40331
Set @eventID = 2183
set @offset = 600  --60 x hours



-- USE THIS ONE
-- with productCode that they scanned with
SELECT       SurveyTitle,  '' as [Session Code (10 chars)], DATEADD(minute, @offset,DATEADD(minute, DATEDIFF(minute, 0, SaveTime), 0)) as calcSave, Answer.Longcode,
             Visitor.FirstName, Visitor.LastName, Visitor.Email, Visitor.Phone, Visitor.PostCode, Visitor.Position, Visitor.Company, Visitor.VisitorStatus,
                         TicketProducts.TicketProductCode as BadgeType, tickets.eventID,
                         ticketordername, ticketorderemail, ticketorderphone, ticketordercompany
FROM            Answer INNER JOIN
                         Survey ON Answer.SurveyID = Survey.SurveyID
                    INNER JOIN Tickets ON answer.longcode = Tickets.TicketLongCode
                                            INNER JOIN
                         TicketOrderProducts ON Tickets.TicketID = TicketOrderProducts.TicketID INNER JOIN
                         TicketProducts ON TicketOrderProducts.TicketProductID = TicketProducts.TicketProductID
     left outer JOIN Visitor ON tickets.visitorID=visitor.visitorID
inner join ticketorders on ticketorders.ticketorderID = tickets.ticketorderID
WHERE         (tickets.EventID = @eventID) and surveytitle like 'sess%' and survey.eventID=@eventID
ORDER BY  surveytitle, Answer.SaveTime, badgetype

DEV note: Steps to send Gala SMS
    Use the query attached to this card.
    Ensure the @eventID parameter is set to the correct event,
    Set the @testPhoneNumber parameter to +61482080001  for testing and set it to NULL  when sending to to the actual number.
    Set the @userName parameter to your user email.
    Send only 1 first (use select top 1 in the query) to test with MQDestination to SMS Number +61482080001 , update the related MQueue row to MQStatus= Active, and see the result
    Double check by looking at the query result (select *), comparing Phone vs InternationalPhone, make sure they are match and correct number.
    If #2 resulted incorrect / unexpected result, test sending again from local machine, repeat step #2 until you are sure it's correct.
    manually insert rows to MQueue, with MQStatus as Pending using attached query (this way it doesnt get executed automatically).
    send 1 first for the queued SMS by updating 1 row to be MQStatus='Active'. Check the log.
    If they are ready to be sent, update the related MQueue MQStatus to Active

Name: SXSW export report of EmperiaUsername / sticker mismatches
Notes:
https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2540

Same process if as 2024:
We have many ticket scanners being used at rooms

Staff onsite are scanning QR CODES stuck to the door with the label of the room

So we can visually compare the room name with the surveytitle

Please export List report to see if there are any MisMatches based off this card
https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1206821388533283/task/1208557581096729

[Insert List of Scanners and their Room Survey Titles] TBA

Survey.EmperiaCode = "aaDoor-C3.3"
Select SurveyID, SurveyTitle, Answer.ScanTimeLocalTime, AnswerDetails.Value from AnswerDetails where SurveyID matches and Value like 'aaDoor%' and value !=Survey.EmperiaCode order by SurveyTitle, Answer.ScanTimeLocal

Put the button in Admin ??? so it's easy for Gem's team to download regularly throughout the day.


DECLARE @eventId int = 2540;

DECLARE @offsetMin int;
  SELECT @offsetMin = 60 * e.EventTimeOffset
  FROM dbo.Event e
  WHERE e.EventID = @eventId;

SELECT distinct
    a.SurveyID,
    s.SurveyTitle,
	EmperiaUsername,
	a.Barcode,
    a.LongCode,
    /* display time in event local time */
    TimeOfScan   = DATEADD(minute, @offsetMin, a.SaveTime),
	CASE WHEN EmperiaUsername NOT LIKE '%' + a.LongCode + '%' THEN 1 else 0 end as MISMATCH
FROM dbo.Answer a
JOIN dbo.Survey s
  ON s.SurveyID = a.SurveyID AND s.EventID = @eventId
WHERE
    a.AnswerStatus = 'active'
    AND a.LongCode IS NOT NULL
	and surveystatus='Active'
	and (surveytitle like 'z%' or surveytitle like 'x-z%') and surveytitle not like 'zz%'
	and surveydevicemode='5'
	and a.LongCode LIKE 'AADoor%'
ORDER BY a.SurveyID, TimeOfScan, a.LongCode;

Looks like Email is done but not sms?


For Gala dinner SMS export, I had to merge the data for the tables so that it is one row for the same phone number

And also a separate merge for the data so that it is one row for the same email address

I also had to include wording in the cells, so it's easy to SMS/email in bulk

It would be good if this is built in so it's easy to export

Neeshil to provide examples

Options:
    Enhance the data export for SMS and Email; or
    Send SMS/Email from inside Admin

Enhance the data export for SMS and Email
    In admin/download we have the Gala download
    Split it in to two, one for Email and one for SMS
    Email should then have multiple columns ([Table1], [table2] etc..) for each row, so that if an Email address has multiple tables, then it puts them in to extra columns
    Same for SMS version, but the columns are when matching the phone number.
    Email version should use the event parameter for that as per below, and the SMS use the SMS parameter as per below.

Proof of concept below



Send SMS/Email from inside Admin

SMS:
    Ability to test and Send Gala SMS from inside Admin
    Needs to work with UK numbers
    Note we have a separate question for mobile country code
    Event parameter for the SMS Gala text: eg  [Firstname] your ticket to the gala dinner can be accessed here [ShortURL] (Table: [Table]). See you tomorrow at the ICC Grand Ballroom, Convention Level 5 at 7pm.
    Note SMS only sends TABLE, not the SEAT
    Add it to the MQUEUE for SMS so it goes via Burst
    IMPORTANT: If a phone number has more than 10 tickets, then do NOT send any to that number
    Testing: Send 10x SMS of random tickets to a specified number
    Products are based on the product attribute of Gala
    Only include ACTIVE tickets (not verification)

Email:
    Ability to test and send Gala Email from inside admin
    Specify a template file in Admin
    EventParameter for the line that has the text [Firstname] [Lastname]'s is seated on table [Table] and their ticket is [ShortURL].
    Needs to work with one ticket or multiple
    Only include ACTIVE tickets (not verification)


Example email: https://exponews.createsend.com/campaigns/reports/viewCampaign.aspx?d=j&c=821343647CEF42AB&ID=89653BEA4DEB20A22540EF23F30FEDED

https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1205921330962040






-- IMARC data
-- Proof of concept to put all longcodes in one row and put country code with phone number
select --firstname,lastname,email,company,phone  , ticketproductcode,

              substring(answerdetails.value,  charindex('(', answerdetails.value)+1,len(answerdetails.value)-1-charindex('(', answerdetails.value)) + case when left(phone,1) = 0 then substring(phone,2,100) else phone end as calcPhone
, string_agg(visitor.longcode, ' | ') within group (order by visitor.longcode asc) as LongCodes
from ticketproducts
         inner join ticketorderproducts on ticketproducts.ticketproductID=ticketorderproducts.ticketproductID
         inner join tickets on tickets.ticketID=ticketorderproducts.ticketID
         inner join visitor on visitor.visitorID=tickets.VisitorID
         left outer  join answer on visitor.VisitorID = answer.visitorID
         left outer join answerdetails on answer.answerID = answerdetails.answerID and questiondetailsID=151009--151318
         where ticketproducts.eventID=2253 and UseGalaDinnerSeating=1
        and ticketstatus='Active' and ticketorderproductstatus='Active'
group by  substring(answerdetails.value,  charindex('(', answerdetails.value)+1,len(answerdetails.value)-1-charindex('(', answerdetails.value)) + case when left(phone,1) = 0 then substring(phone,2,100) else phone end

Name: IMPORTANT: SXSW SessionMapping table
Notes:
CONTEXT: 
At events, we sometimes set one survey to scan the whole day in a room.  Later we then want to split the scans of the day in that room, to be specific to a session. eg in SurveyID 123 9am to 10am was OUR HERO, BALTHAZAR, 10:30-11:30 was SHORT FILMS: IFP WATCH PARTY, 1:30 to 2:30 was THE TRUE BEAUTY OF BEING BITTEN BY A TICK

We would like to 'automate' this so we don't have to keep doing custom queries.

So the idea is we can import a session mapping spreadsheet that tells us the surveyID, session name, date/time of start/finish and then we can output this in a simple fashion.

To do:
    Create a SessionMapping table (or whatever you choose to call it)
    Note sessions to products is 1 to 1 
    ProductID is nullable
    Import the data for SXSW
    Creating queries is another card

Ignore the yellow columns as these are derived fields

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1j3XLPO3p579BayvxOPwZPBl6gGIE5SbL1kL1FmYUtCM/edit?gid=1288465768#gid=1288465768

Name: IMPORTANT SXSW Upgrades - addons autocancel
Notes:
In SXSW people may be upgrading their packs. eg PRO PASS to PLATINUM etc

They can do this online using the ticket link and also could be done by customer service in Admin. 

Some packs like PRO-PASS have essential addons (eg MUSIC, TECH etc) to work out what stream they are .in. But when they upgrade to platinum pass those addons are not necessary anymore and the addons need to be auto-cancelled.

    When a pro-pass successfully upgrades to a PLATINUM the pro-pass specific addons need to be cancelled automatically.
    Upgrade from a conference day pass to pro pass or platinum their day-pass addons need to be removed.
    When they change from a pro-pass to a conference day pass or platinum
    What about passes in general. ie if it is a non-pro pass main product, then we should cancel any pro-pass addons


----------------------------------------

Pro-pass rules:

If any of the ACTIVE addons on a ticket are:
39421,Games Pro Pass
39422,Music Pro Pass
39423,Screen Pro Pass
39424,Tech & Innovation Pro Pass

And the main product of that ticket is NOT any of these:
39378,Pro Pass
39379,Pro Pass - Talent
39380,Pro Pass - Staff
39387,Pro Pass (International)
41893,Pro Pass + 12 Month MIT Tech Review Subscription
41894,Pro Pass Int +12Month MIT Tech Review Subscription
42204,Pro Pass (External Sales)

Then cancel these ACTIVE  addons on that ticket
39421,Games Pro Pass
39422,Music Pro Pass
39423,Screen Pro Pass
39424,Tech & Innovation Pro Pass


----------------------------------------



CONFERENCE DAY PASS RULES:
If any of the ACTIVE addons on a ticket are:
39425,Day Pass - Monday Access
39426,Day Pass - Tuesday Access
39427,Day Pass - Wednesday Access
39428,Day Pass - Thursday Access
39429,Day Pass - Friday Access

And the main product of that ticket is NOT any of these:
39381,Conference Day Pass
39388,Conference Day Pass (International)
41479,Conference Day Pass - Talent
42206,Conference Day Pass (External Sales)

Then cancel these ACTIVE  addons on that ticket
39425,Day Pass - Monday Access
39426,Day Pass - Tuesday Access
39427,Day Pass - Wednesday Access
39428,Day Pass - Thursday Access
39429,Day Pass - Friday Access

Name: Export session data for all theatre scanners
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #27 8/10 to 14/10
Notes:
This needs to be done on the date (which is Monday morning after show finishes)

Same as task from previous event https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1209011524724058/task/1210479786229091?focus=true

Admin Link https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2600

Extract the data from https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/59886 and https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/59885 session scanners to confirm scan start and finish times and then import this back into Universal Report. 
Note: we need the exported file to include NULL data

Example query for Dev

-- Export Theatre scans and also include ticket order data, and allow for unregistered visitors
-- 1328 / 18968 / 18967
-- Theatre scanner export - de-duplicate

-- Export a list of visitors who scanned in theatres at an event
-- Note the surveyttitle where clauses is like '%session%'  change as required
declare @surveyID integer
declare @eventID integer
declare @OffSet integer

-- Set @surveyID = 40331
Set @eventID = 2183
set @offset = 600  --60 x hours



-- USE THIS ONE
-- with productCode that they scanned with
SELECT       SurveyTitle,  '' as [Session Code (10 chars)], DATEADD(minute, @offset,DATEADD(minute, DATEDIFF(minute, 0, SaveTime), 0)) as calcSave, Answer.Longcode,
             Visitor.FirstName, Visitor.LastName, Visitor.Email, Visitor.Phone, Visitor.PostCode, Visitor.Position, Visitor.Company, Visitor.VisitorStatus,
                         TicketProducts.TicketProductCode as BadgeType, tickets.eventID,
                         ticketordername, ticketorderemail, ticketorderphone, ticketordercompany
FROM            Answer INNER JOIN
                         Survey ON Answer.SurveyID = Survey.SurveyID
                    INNER JOIN Tickets ON answer.longcode = Tickets.TicketLongCode
                                            INNER JOIN
                         TicketOrderProducts ON Tickets.TicketID = TicketOrderProducts.TicketID INNER JOIN
                         TicketProducts ON TicketOrderProducts.TicketProductID = TicketProducts.TicketProductID
     left outer JOIN Visitor ON tickets.visitorID=visitor.visitorID
inner join ticketorders on ticketorders.ticketorderID = tickets.ticketorderID
WHERE         (tickets.EventID = @eventID) and surveytitle like 'sess%' and survey.eventID=@eventID
ORDER BY  surveytitle, Answer.SaveTime, badgetype

Name: SXSW DEV - Check Customer Service Code
Notes:
Onsite at SXSW we will be using Customer Service widget in Console for onsite badge printing.
This feature has not been used since SXSW last year in October 2024.

Please check the code to ensure this feature is still working as expected.

Expectations include:
    Ability to search all registrations (both registered and unregistered)
    Ability to edit details on all registrations and updates to take affect in real time
        E.g. I am updating a visitors name, then printing their badge within 5 seconds expecting the updated name to print on the badge
    Ability to register an unregistered record
        Last year there was a link that directed us to m.lup to register the record
        Again, expecting this to take immediate affect so we can print their badge in real time
    Ability to take a photo using an external webcam of the attendee's face
        We should also be allowed to take a photo that replaces an existing image 
        Changes to take affect in real time and print updated image on badge
    Ability to know if a badge has already been printed
        Some kind of text or marker on the search page that shows if a registration has already been printed, without needing to open the registration

Name: SXSW DEV - Colour badge layout - ProPass
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #26 1/10 to 7/10
Notes:
Hi Team,

We set up ticketing for SXSW differently this year for Pro Passes.

Last year we had created unique products for each Pro Pass (exmaple: pro pass - music, pro pass - screen, pro pass - games)

This year we set pro passes up as 1 product: Pro Pass, and set the different pass types as Add Ons.
So I register for a Pro pass and I have an add on where i choose music, screen or games.

Unfortunately when we launched ticketing we did not consider that this would impact our ability to set up a unique colour badge layout per product by having the same product.

So we need the system to allocate the colour badge layout based on their add ons for Pro Passes to print and based on the colour badge pdf template in each add on.

Name: IMPORTANT SXSW Disable ticket stream during configuration / Server Load expectations
Notes:
Email address:
manuel.caguioa@lup.events

Title of the task:
SXSW Server Load expectations


Priority:
Normal

Description:
Hi Dev team. Please note we will creating many surveys, adding thousands and products to surveys and ticket steam which always cause high server loads. If we can have something to turn off in the system to not cause this surge whilst we set up all our entitlements and surveys. We will start doing this on the week of September 22 after the last September event (OFD Melbourne on Sep 21) where there will be no events running for that week.

Proposed solution:
    Hardcode in the system that this event only will not add to ticket stream when adding/deleting/removing products from a ticket survey
    Production team can then do their work. 
    Once work is completed by Thursday 9th October hard code can be removed
    Dev team 'do something' to make the ticketstreams get populated in a non-cripple the system manner.

Where to do this:
    On https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/59794?eventID=2540 Add/remove products from survey https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/59794?eventID=2540
    Also the ticket stream handler, should ignore if tickets are on this event for now

Name: DEV - Update Badgelines to NULL
Notes:
We need to use the badgelines to print T for any product that is a Talent Badge.

Example Product: https://admin.lup.com.au/TicketProduct/EditTicketProduct/39379

https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1208971354820644/task/1211486607226034?focus=true, we are ignoring the colour badge pdf template for all Pro Pass Products. Instead, we are using the template as per the Add On (Screen, Music, Games, Tech & Innovation).

The challenge we now face is that for Pro Pass - Talent we need a T to display in the badge text. But for the other Pro Pass Products, we need to badge text to be BLANK / NULL. The system won't let us do this. It is displaying VISITOR as this is the default.

For when the system calculated Badgeline text, currently it is hardcoded that if there is no badgeline value on the product. eg it is NULL or blank string, then it defaults to VISITOR. 

Can we remove this permanently from all events? And treat it as blank or null means make it blank or null.

Also note that this means if a record has VISITOR as badgetext but now the product is saying it should be NULL then when we update it the badgeline text should become blank

Neeshil has authorised this

Name: IMPORTANT ADMIN: Ticket updates/transfers etc
Notes:
For events, particularly IMARC and RT we need to have a 'correct' way of transferring registrations to a new person.  Currently the customer service team just updates a person's email and name and phone, which isn't ideal.

Also this doesn't flow to the API correctly for external systems like Hubspot via Integrate API.



As integrator
When we 'transfer' a registration to a new visitor this needs to go through API correctly
So that my integration can update appropriately

As a paid delegate to the show
I want to be able to easily send someone else in my place
So that I don't lose money

As customer service
I want to easily transfer someones registration to a new person, adhering to business rules
So that I can follow security practices/requirements and API integration requirements easily


Gotchas:
    Deregister ticket, is it removing ticket.visitorID and updating visitor.barcode nad visitor.longcode to new ones and the existing ticketshortcode and ticketlongcode stays the same?
        What happens with existing scans? does that go with the old record or the new ones? (keep scans with the ticket, not the original registrant)
        Implications with new code that is building allocating an online order with orphaned regstrations?
    Reissue ticket functionality in admin: xyz?
    Transfer ticket functionality


So we want to do this more correctly:
1: Cancel old ticket and create new ticket (including values)
2: Integrate API should be updated automatically to reflect the cancellation.  (Ideally the old ticket is shown as 'Transferred' so the API can handle it accordingly)
3: New ticket is registered with m.lup

Step 1: Cancel old ticket and create new ticket  See implementation below on https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/task/1209736188374617/comment/1211178727044261?focus=true
    In admin/ticket in the ticket sub-tab we should in the drop down have a TRANSFER option next to the ticket if it is an ACTIVE or VERIFICATION ticket on an ACTIVE (or TEST) order
        eg on this dropdown

https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1211137687850082

    The selected ticket will be cancelled 
        and ticketorderpacks, ticketorderproducts, coupons???) but leave the ticketorder and ticketordertransaction active
        What happens with the old visitor record? What happens with the old visitor Status?
    New (unregistered) ticket is created in the same order with the same packs and add-on packs (and products)
        These should basically be a copy of the old ticket/ticketorderpack/coupon etc
    If the product requires security checks then the ticket status should be Verification, regardless of if the source ticket was already approved
    The value of the new ticket and it's packs matches the old cancelled tickets
    The overall value of the order remains the same
    The total number of active tickets remains the same
    Be sure to test this for orders that have coupons etc

Step 2: API
    Is there anything we can do with articulating in the API that this cancellation was due to a 'Transfer'?

Step 3: Register the new ticket
    The user will register the New ticket is registered either immediately or shortly after
    This should go through API normally and no additioanl work required

https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1204597380399172 we are letting client know on this https://3.basecamp.com/4144748/buckets/34064615/todos/8298671122

Name: [MONDAY- 22/9] Export session data for all theatre scanners
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request), BAU #25 24/9 to 30/9
Notes:
This needs to be done on the date (which is Monday morning after show finishes)

Same as task from previous event https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1209011524724058/task/1210479786229091?focus=true

Admin Link https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2590

Extract the data from https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/58602 and https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/EditSurvey/58603 session scanners to confirm scan start and finish times and then import this back into Universal Report. 
Note: we need the exported file to include NULL data

Example query for Dev

-- Export Theatre scans and also include ticket order data, and allow for unregistered visitors
-- 1328 / 18968 / 18967
-- Theatre scanner export - de-duplicate

-- Export a list of visitors who scanned in theatres at an event
-- Note the surveyttitle where clauses is like '%session%'  change as required
declare @surveyID integer
declare @eventID integer
declare @OffSet integer

-- Set @surveyID = 40331
Set @eventID = 2183
set @offset = 600  --60 x hours



-- USE THIS ONE
-- with productCode that they scanned with
SELECT       SurveyTitle,  '' as [Session Code (10 chars)], DATEADD(minute, @offset,DATEADD(minute, DATEDIFF(minute, 0, SaveTime), 0)) as calcSave, Answer.Longcode,
             Visitor.FirstName, Visitor.LastName, Visitor.Email, Visitor.Phone, Visitor.PostCode, Visitor.Position, Visitor.Company, Visitor.VisitorStatus,
                         TicketProducts.TicketProductCode as BadgeType, tickets.eventID,
                         ticketordername, ticketorderemail, ticketorderphone, ticketordercompany
FROM            Answer INNER JOIN
                         Survey ON Answer.SurveyID = Survey.SurveyID
                    INNER JOIN Tickets ON answer.longcode = Tickets.TicketLongCode
                                            INNER JOIN
                         TicketOrderProducts ON Tickets.TicketID = TicketOrderProducts.TicketID INNER JOIN
                         TicketProducts ON TicketOrderProducts.TicketProductID = TicketProducts.TicketProductID
     left outer JOIN Visitor ON tickets.visitorID=visitor.visitorID
inner join ticketorders on ticketorders.ticketorderID = tickets.ticketorderID
WHERE         (tickets.EventID = @eventID) and surveytitle like 'sess%' and survey.eventID=@eventID
ORDER BY  surveytitle, Answer.SaveTime, badgetype
Blocking (Dependencies): Import session scanning data into Console

Name: Auto UVA addon badge text
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),Event BAU #17 6/8 to 12/8
Notes:
Email address:
neeshil@lup.events

Title of the task:
Auto UVA addon badge text

Due Date:
Aug 27, 2025

Priority:
Normal

Description:
In an event sometimes a single person may have multiple tickets (badges), and some addons are on one badge and not the other. We want as default that all their addons shown on the printed badge, regardless of which ticket the addon belongs to

Note: This only effects the visual on the badges, it does NOT effect the ticket stream. So if they scan the badge that technically doesn't have the addon product added to it, then it will come up as UNRECOGNISED message


If someone has multiple badges, have their addons show on all the badges not just the one.

eg  John, Smith, john@example.com as two registrations:
    DELEGATE has GOLF and GALA
    And EXHIBITOR has NETWORKING

Then printing either badge should have

    GALA GOLF NETWORKING on either badge that gets printed


This should be enabled by default when doing an event with badgelines.

An event parameter to disable this if needed.

Notes:

jenny.byard@lup.events

Title of the task:
Investigate Email Process for Accepted Products

Due Date:
Aug 28, 2025

Priority:
High - 7 days

Event Code:
2510 - IMARC

Description:
Client is highly concerned the 'Accepted' products such as the following are not receiving their Confirmed Emails. As it mainly affects those products that are in Active status not Verification.
Investor Accepted
https://admin.lup.com.au/TicketProduct/EditTicketProduct/39196
Mining Guest Accepted
https://admin.lup.com.au/TicketProduct/EditTicketProduct/39197
NextGen Accepted
https://admin.lup.com.au/TicketProduct/EditTicketProduct/39226
Media Accepted
https://admin.lup.com.au/TicketProduct/EditTicketProduct/39188

Client had sent through these examples not sending (with Error log)
https://admin.lup.com.au/Ticket?o=11729709
https://admin.lup.com.au/Ticket?o=11403684


https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1211051820774694


Currently on the Active Products the htmls are set to zzz'd status and not sent until later (part of the email process) so if Beacon try to resend, Mqueue fails to send
https://admin.lup.com.au/EventParameter/Edit/11995
Only htmls that are set in Verification can still be sent or resent.
https://admin.lup.com.au/EventParameter/Edit/11998

For this order https://admin.lup.com.au/Ticket?o=11729341
it seems this is an import and NOSIC has Approved. Email Send is failed. There will be cases like this as well that won't be able to receive their email.

Currently we are manually uploading the template, then send and then set it back to zzz in the event parameter and is not an efficient process for us or the client.

Is there a way for a script to run regularly to look for those 'Accepted' products that have had Mqueue email fail and to send the Confirmation email?

If this can be worked on or advise another way to resolve this issue that would be greatly appreciated.
Many thanks

Name: DEV - Duplicate Emails CSV Export
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #22 3/9 to 9/9
Notes:
https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2540 For this event the duplicate email check was meant to be on and was only turned on a week ago. For the SXSW App it requires a unique email to create a profile and log in with. Please isolate and export the duplicates as a csv file. CSV file will have columns for: > [TicketOrderName],[TicketOrderEmail],[Ticket1],[Ticket2],[Ticket3],[Ticket4],[Ticket5],[Ticket6],[Ticket7],[Ticket8],[Ticket9],[Ticket10] and the value of the [Ticketx] columns will be:
  • {TicketFirstname} {TicketLastname}'s ticket ({OrderID}/TicketShortCode) is {TicketEmail}
    • E.g john@xample.com has 2 tickets with that email then ticket1, ticket2 columns will be populated like example above.  and ticket3.. ticket10 will be empty ticket1 column:
  • John Smith's ticket ({12456/32321}) is john@example.com
    • ticket2 column:
  • Sally Smith's ticket ({12456/32323}) is john@example.com
    • That way we have the OrderID and QRCODE handy to make it easier to update We will send an email via campaign monitor so they can advise their email address. Any queries please let me know. Many thanks

Notes:

As Organiser
I want people who were security cleared last year to be auto-approved this year
So that it saves time and money in security approvals process

After someone registers the system should check:
    If it is "verification "status
    And not in a list of 'dont auto-approve' products
    Email address is not a throaway email or generic email (eg hotmail, QQ, gmail etc)
    Email address domain is not:
        Lup.events
        https://lup.com.au
        https://beaconevents.com
        https://amda.com.au
    Event has enabled "Auto-verification"
    Check active tickets on active orders from linked events that had been through a verification process
    Update the status
    If in previous year it was security approved 
    If there are multiple years records that were security approved just use most previous year 
    Send the ticket email again (Auto-verification setup should have this on / off)

Name: IMPORTANT: Stock Service - Disable Updating Product Qty Available If Current Value -1
Notes:
2308 Science Alive Adelaide
Gemma: Sold Out not working (or i have not done it properly and need help).
All tickets need to display as sold out (excluding onsite)
I marked all as -1
I checked the ticket page and all were sold out.
Now they are back up online

Lilis Ramadhani discovered that after the first time, Gemma set them to -1, there were still some stock hold reservations, and when they expired, it returned back the reserved stock to the qty available, making it > -1 and allowing the products to sell again.
https://lupevents.slack.com/archives/C028C5GDW49/p1691291804017059?thread_ts=1691289368.570549&cid=C028C5GDW49

Additional Requirement for DEV:
Please also check all related repos to respect the QTY capacity number when calculating the qty inventory/available

Created from Slack: https://lupevents.slack.com/archives/C028C5GDW49/p1691289368570549?thread_ts=1691289368.570549&cid=C028C5GDW49

Steps:
    on TicketProduct's edit page, instead of user set the qty available to -1 to make it sold out, 
        Put a SOLD OUT button next to the QTY Available number field. SOLD OUT button will calculate and set the QTY Capacity based on the current QTY available and QTY inventory numbers. i.e. QTY Capacity = sold number, set all stock hold to be expired, QTY available = -1.
        All changes to TicketProdutc's field have to be logged to the Log table.
        Question for CS/event builder team: is there any event documentation that record the QTY capacity / QTY Available number of the products of an event?

2. On Admin Refund, Admin ChangePack, Ticketing Upgrade,  check if admin/ticketing raising the TicketReturned event correctly and check if GalenErso service read and process it correctly.
i.e. :
        Check if QTY Capacity is set for the old product. 
            If it doesn't set, check if the QTY Available is -1 (sold out). If the QTY Available is sold out, do not put back (add by 1) the QTY Available of the old product.
            If it's set (QTY Capacity > 0) and qty available > 0, calculate current product used number (sold + available + held) vs QTY capacity, if product used number < QTY Capacity, update qty available by +1 ( will need to check if update also needed for the qty inventory), otherwise do nothing.
            If it's set (QTY Capacity > 0) and qty available < 0 (-1), calculate current product used number (sold + available (0) + held) vs QTY capacity, if product used number < QTY Capacity, update qty available to be 1 (as it was -1/sold out previously), otherwise do nothing.
3. When Checking stock holds in GalenErso service, 
        Check if QTY Capacity is set for the old product. 
            If it doesn't set, check if the QTY Available is -1 (sold out). If the QTY Available is sold out, return false
            If it's set (QTY Capacity > 0) and qty available > 0, calculate current product used number (sold + available + held) vs QTY capacity, if product used number < QTY Capacity, return (stock requested <= qtyCapacity - productNumber).
            If it's set (QTY Capacity > 0) and qty available < 0 (-1), calculate current product used number (sold + available (0) + held) vs QTY capacity, if product used number < QTY Capacity, return (stock requested <= qtyCapacity - productNumber). return false

This way, even if the QTY Available > 0 but if the product used number exceeds the QTY capacity, it will prevent/failed the stock hold request.


4. Check TicketReturned event raised by refund. https://admin.lup.com.au/Ticket?o=9071644 there were 2 x SUN Adult refunded, but there were 4 TicketReturned event that processed by GalenErso
http://fox.lup.com.au:5341/#/events?signal=signal-66,signal-314&filter=TicketOrderId%20%3D%209071644

https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1205219215932132
Blocking (Dependencies): IMPORTANT: Stock control issues

code compliant, each kit will be displayed in green indicating an audit is not yet due, orange is due
now and red is overdue.

account. Approved users can see the status of any kit at any location or department to view the
status of each First Aid Kit. Nominated users can be assigned to their own group so only certain kits
are viewable. Restrictions can be placed for a user to only have the authority to place quotes,
approved users can authorise a quote and convert it to an order.

will email Audit sheets with the kit name and contents to start an audit, if no action has been taken,
we are able to email a supervisor to advise of this.

report on items that has been replenished to each kit, this is particularly handy to see highly
consumed items or possible shrinkage to any kit, this detailed report will show the location, what
items have been ordered to each kit, the cost of the item and a total cost of sales to each kit.
5: our WHS compliant portal is absolutely FREE to all of our customers, you only pay for the items
purchased to each kit, our easy to follow First Aid Kit Wizard will allow you to setup your existing kits
and names for easy identification for when goods arrive to your nominated location.

Notes:

Pull opt in numbers

Aug 15, 2025

Priority:
Urgent - 24 hours turnaround

Multiple 

Description:
I need 2 numbers: How many opted in to the flight centre registration question: for week 1 and then week 2 of August 


Question:
Win a $10,000* Flight Centre Gift Card to spend on an unforgettable holiday to New Zealand! Don't miss out - enter today by joining Flight Centre Perks.




-- Events with flight centre questions
select event.eventID, eventcode, CountryID, survey.eventID, survey.surveyID,
       'https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/' + cast(survey.surveyID as nvarchar) + '?eventID=' + cast(event.eventID as varchar(10)) as SurveyLink,
       questionOptions.QuestionDetailsID , question, questionstatus,
       optioncode, optionvalue, optionID, optionstatus
from survey
         inner join questiondetails on survey.surveyID = questiondetails.surveyID
                                  inner join questionoptions on questiondetails.questiondetailSid= questionoptions.questiondetailsID
inner join event on event.eventID=survey.eventID
where
      ((question like '%Flight Centre%') and optionvalue   like '%yes%')
and eventdatestart >='2024-07-01'
order by eventdatestart

Priority:

Event Code:
2507 Moreton Bay Food Wine

Are having facebook pixel errors

"

https://tickets.lup.com.au/moreton-bay-food-wine-festival-2025?cat=cat-registration&_gl=1*1t3jmf3*_gcl_aw*R0NMLjE3NDczOTU0NjkuRUFJYUlRb2JDaE1Jall2R3dwV25qUU1WR1Z3UEFoMHNtZ3d0RUFBWUFTQUFFZ0x2UV9EX0J3RQ..*_gcl_au*MTA5NjEzOTgxOS4xNzQ2NjE4MDAx*_ga*MjEyNjU3MTI3Mi4xNzQ2NjE4MDAx*_ga_14707Q3LNC*czE3NDczOTU0NjYkbzIkZzEkdDE3NDczOTU0NjgkajU4JGwwJGg0MjExNDc2NjM.



this is the console view from the checkout page, "Facebook Pixel: No valid "ecommerce" object found in dataLayer"


https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1210271970669222




I asked Chat GPT for some assistance on this error "Facebook Pixel: No valid "ecommerce" object found in dataLayer"

this was the prompt. 
I'm having an issue tracking purchases in Facebook via Google Tag manager, The value of purchases is reporting in GA4, but it is not reporting directly in Facebook, we are getting this error in the chrome tools console, "Facebook Pixel: No valid "ecommerce" object found in dataLayer" This is the page where we are seeing the issue: https://tickets.lup.com.au/Payment/Checkout/2561 We have a Data layer variable set up in tag manager for Currency, transaction ID and value, Can you please investigate and offer any solutions that we can try. 

one of it's suggestions is: 
Look for an object similar to:

javascriptCopyEdit{
  event: "purchase",
  ecommerce: {
    transaction_id: "123456",
    value: 89.00,
    currency: "AUD"
  }
}


If there’s no ecommerce object, Facebook’s tag won’t work properly.

As I hinted earlier, this is the data layer for begin_checkout (the purchase event is likely to be the same

{
  event: "begin_checkout",
  gtm: {uniqueEventId: 5, start: 1747343932312},
  eventModel: {
    currency: "AUD",
    value: "$67.38",
    coupon: "",
    items: [
      {
        item_id: "39364",
        item_name: "FRI - Adult (18+ yrs)",
        item_category: "Ticket",
        price: "30",
        quantity: 1,
        index: 0,
        item_variant: "General Admission Friday"
      },
      {
        item_id: "39364",
        item_name: "FRI - Adult (18+ yrs)",
        item_category: "Ticket",
        price: "30",
        quantity: 1,
        index: 1,
        item_variant: "General Admission Friday"
      }
    ]
  }
}

Facebook is expecting to see ecommerce where eventModel is placed. 
I had tested with eventModel and ecommerce in the tags, The GA4 ones have eventModel and we are seeing values reported, but I'm unsure if your built in integration needs to have the variables for it to report values? 
I had eventModel variable for value and currency as the are required by Facebook and it didn't report anything in Facebook, then switched to ecommerce.value to test and haven't seen any results either in facebook. 
conclusion, is in your data layer, to be consistent with other platforms (eg, shopify and woocommerce) should the data layer use ecommerce instead of eventModel

Name: [LOW] Ticketing: Enumeration of Event IDs is possible via an un-authenticated endpoint
Notes:
• https://tickets.lup.com.au/0001 ... https://tickets.lup.com.au/9999
Potential Security Issue:
• My enumerating through ids, it is possible to determine upcoming events, past events, determine all past and present customers of lup.

Recommendation:
• Review the business need to disclose previous ID’s. Consider blocking access to events where there is no business need to display the event.
• Review this information disclosure in the context of business risk and determine if obfuscation using GUIDs, or other non-sequential numbers is appropriate, considering the impact of a model, or schema re-architecture required, or overhead of aliasing to a non-sequential random identifier.
• If no action is to be taken, formally document the acceptance of this risk.

Name: Flight Centre manual sponsor data export
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #13 9/7 - 15/7,BAU #13 9/7 to 15/7
Notes:
Email address:
neeshil@lup.events

Title of the task:
Flight Centre manual sponsor data export

Due Date:
Jul 16, 2025

Priority:
High - 7 days

Description:
Flight centre are still working on their API integration.  Can we make it easier for them to get their data of opted in people from a certain date.  So a data export from our system of all registrations since the last export we did for them

Pull this data every xxx number of days as required by https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1199915143433827

eg 
EventCode, Visitor firstname, lastname, email, phone, postcode
Visitor Status can be ignored
We do not need additional answers like Gender etc

For any registration that has opted in to a flight centre question (See example query, test it check it for yourselves)

It really is this data set as per this card (that has been cleaned and meet their requirements
https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1203444271984192/task/1210702534904421?focus=true




-- These are the OptionID's for flight centre opt-ins
select event.eventID, eventcode, CountryID, survey.eventID, survey.surveyID,
       'https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/' + cast(survey.surveyID as nvarchar) + '?eventID=' + cast(event.eventID as varchar(10)) as SurveyLink,
       questionOptions.QuestionDetailsID , question, questionstatus,
       optioncode, optionvalue, optionID, optionstatus
from survey
         inner join questiondetails on survey.surveyID = questiondetails.surveyID
                                  inner join questionoptions on questiondetails.questiondetailSid= questionoptions.questiondetailsID
inner join event on event.eventID=survey.eventID
where
      ((question like '%Flight Centre%') and optionvalue   like '%yes%')
and eventdatestart >='2024-07-01'
order by eventdatestart

Name: lup.to short url rebuild
Notes:
# URL Shortener Service Specification

## Overview
The goal is to build a scalable, high-performance URL shortener service with logging and statistics capabilities. The system should handle high loads and provide detailed tracking of URL usage. Additionally, it must support migration of existing short URLs from an Azure storage account.


https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1210180955539325



## Key Features

### 1. URL Redirection
- **Redirection Engine**: Use Amazon S3 as the redirection engine.
 - Activate "website hosting" on the S3 bucket.
 - Create an empty object for each short URL (case-sensitive random 5-character ID in a folder with a single char & ensure it is already not in use) with a policy to delete it after 365 days.
 - Attach "website redirect" metadata with the target (long) URL.
 - S3 will automatically respond with an HTTP redirect to the target URL when the short URL is accessed.

### 2. Domains
- **Primary Domains**:
 - `a.lup.to`: Handles GET requests for redirection.
 - `https://api.ap.lup.events/linkshortener`: A .NET microservice for all other endpoints.

### 3. API Endpoints
#### a. Create Short URLs
1. **POST /create**
  - **Purpose**: Create a new short URL for an event.
  - **Input**:
    - API Key (trusted, machine-to-machine calls, using existing identity approach check clientId is 1,  pass to admin && ticket the api key via env variable).
    - Event GUID (optional).
    - Batch ID (optional).
  - **Requirements**:
    - Must be quick and handled in-process, if there are 500k messages in the bus must still be not affected.
  - **Output**:
    - `201 Created` with the following JSON response:
      ```json
      {
       "shortUrl": "https://a.lup.to/g/abc12"
      }
      ```

2. **POST /bulk**
  - **Purpose**: Create multiple short URLs for an event.
  - **Input**:
    - User Token (less trusted, end-user calls).
    - Event GUID (optional).
    - Batch ID (optional).
  - **Requirements**:
    - Validate user token.
    - Fire off commands via a message bus.
    - Return a `jobId` for tracking.
  - **Output**:
    - `200 Accepted` with the following JSON response:
      ```json
      {
       "jobId": "job-id"
      }
      ```

#### b. Update Short URLs
- **PUT /update**
 - **Purpose**: Admin-only endpoint to edit existing short URLs.
 - **Input**:
   - Admin credentials.
   - Short URL key.
   - New target URL.

#### c. CRUD Operations
1. **GET /batches**
  - **Purpose**: Paginated list of batches.

2. **GET /short-urls**
  - **Purpose**: Paginated list of short URLs.
  - **Filters**:
    - By event.
    - By job ID.
    - By event + batch.

#### d. Statistics
- **GET /stats**
 - **Purpose**: Retrieve usage statistics.
 - **Filters**:
   - By event.
   - By batch.
   - By shorturl.
 - **Implementation**:
   - Use S3 Server Access Logs, AWS CloudTrail, or CloudFront access logs to track hits.
   - Set up a cron job to pull logs every hour and update usage data.

### 4. Migration
- **Purpose**: Migrate existing short URLs from an Azure storage account to the new system.
- **Implementation**:
 - Create a live cron job to pull old short URLs from Azure.
 - Load them into the new system via a command that allows setting the key.

### 5. Requirements
- **Case Sensitivity**: Ensure short URLs are case-sensitive.
- **Short URL Format**:
 - Old format: `https://lup.to/gH0Ty66`
 - New format: `https://lup.to/g/0Ty66`
 - First two characters (`g`) are fixed for a deployment e.g., this service is running in `au` we might say we want everything in bucket `a`.

### 6. Logging
- **Purpose**: Track when a URL is used.
- **Implementation**:
 - Use S3 Server Access Logs, AWS CloudTrail, or CloudFront access logs.
 - Store logs for analysis and reporting.

## Non-Functional Requirements
- **Scalability**: Must handle high loads instantly.
- **Performance**: Machine-to-machine API calls must be processed in real-time.
- **Security**:
 - API Key for trusted calls.
 - User Token for less trusted calls.
 - Admin-only access for update operations.

## Deliverables
1. Fully functional URL shortener service.
2. Documentation for API endpoints.
3. Migration worker for existing short URLs.
4. Logging and statistics collection system.
5. Unit and integration tests for all features.

## Additional Task
- **Timebox**: Please allocate one day to implement and test the behavior where:
 - If the URL matches the pattern `https://lup.to/gH0Ty66`, it should check in the `lgylinks` storage account.
 - If the URL matches the pattern `https://lup.to/g/0Ty66`, it should check in the `newlinks` storage account.
 - Use CloudFront with Lambda@Edge to route requests based on these patterns.

## Notes
- Refer to the following AWS blog posts for additional context:
 - [Build a Serverless Private URL Shortener](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/build-a-serverless-private-url-shortener/)
 - [Building a Serverless URL Shortener App Without Lambda (Part 1)](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/building-a-serverless-url-shortener-app-without-lambda-part-1/)

Name: Flight Centre visitor data - update to meet FC requirements
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #13 9/7 - 15/7,BAU #13 9/7 to 15/7
Notes:
Email address:
neeshil@lup.events

Title of the task:
Flight Centre visitor data - enhance quality

Due Date:
Jul 8, 2025

Priority:
High - 7 days

Event Code:
Flight Centre Sponsor

Description:
For visitor registrations that opt in to flight centre, we need to check/fix the quality of the data

This is to manually update the visitor records to ensure we comply

For anyone who has opted in to Flight Centre opt-in, we need to have two things:
    List of visitors who's data isn't clean as per Flight Centre standards
    Update those visitors to be clean as per Flight Centre standards


Cleanliness rules:
Only for those who have opted in to Flight Centre questions:

Visitor.Firstname, Visitor.Lastname:
    Only allow characters:
        a...z 
        A..Z
        space
        All 5 types of hyphens:
            Hyphen-minus -
            En dash –
            Em dash —
            Non-breaking hyphen ‑
            Figure dash ‒
        apostrophe '
        apostrophe `
        ampersand &
        full stop .
        Brackets ( )
    Any other characters should be removed
        Double check if any other characters should be included in this)
    All 5 types of hyphens should be standardised

Visitor.Postcode
    Step 1: For AU and NZ events if it has non-numeric characters clean out the non-numeric characters
    Step 2:
        AU and NZ events must have 4 numeric characters only. 
        If not 4 numeric digits then make it empty

Visitor.Phone
    Remove all non-numeric characters
    Australian events, if it does not start with 61 then drop the leading 0 and add a prefix of 61
    NZ events if it does not start with a 64 then drop the leading 0 and add a prefix of 64
    Aus / NZ events prefix it with +

Visitor.Email
    Ensure it is a valid email address according to RFC standard.
    Do we clean it if it is not or leave it as is?





-- These are the OptionID's for flight centre opt-ins
select event.eventID, eventcode, CountryID, survey.eventID, survey.surveyID,
       'https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/' + cast(survey.surveyID as nvarchar) + '?eventID=' + cast(event.eventID as varchar(10)) as SurveyLink,
       questionOptions.QuestionDetailsID , question, questionstatus,
       optioncode, optionvalue, optionID, optionstatus
from survey
         inner join questiondetails on survey.surveyID = questiondetails.surveyID
                                  inner join questionoptions on questiondetails.questiondetailSid= questionoptions.questiondetailsID
inner join event on event.eventID=survey.eventID
where
      ((question like '%Flight Centre%') and optionvalue   like '%yes%')
and eventdatestart >='2024-07-01'
order by eventdatestart

Name: [MEDIUM] PDF website processes all pages as per the normal site, doubling attack surface area
Notes:
• https://tickets-pdf.lup.com.au/917

Potential Security Issue:
• The ensure ticketing site is duplicated in order to support PDF generation.
• Should the PDF site not be updated as often as either the tickets site, the PDF site may be vulnerable to security issues that were otherwise patched on the Tickets site.
• Should the PDF VM operating system and IIS platform not be updated in line with Microsoft Azure Apps, which is likely not even possible, the underlying infrastructure may be vulnerable to exploits that are addressed on the Azure IIS App.
• A second site with access to the underlying databases and holding all the same access keys doubles the attack surface area of the application, if not more where the second site is a VM.

Recommendation:
• Migrate PDF generation to support Web Apps, in line with the rest of the applications.
• This is based on the assumption that any effort to reduce access to the non-PDFs aspect of the website would be better spend addressing the issue that results in the need for a VM over Serverless Infrastructure.

Notes:

neeshil@lup.events

Title of the task:
Ticketing: Duplicate checks inconsistencies

Due Date:
Jun 20, 2025

Priority:
High - 7 days

Event Code:
2509 AusFitness

Description:
We have duplicate checks on Cart abandonment step and ticketing step (and also m.lup).  This does not seem to be behaving as expected.

If a product has ExcludeDuplicateChecks = TRUE that means:
    WORKING: When registering this product, don't check for duplicates
    NOT WORKING: When checking another purchase for duplicates, it should EXCLUDE any registrations with this ExcludeDuplicateChecksProduct flag from the set of data we are comparing to. 
        eg if CONTRACTOR has ExcludeDuplicateChecks = TRUE and john@example.com is registered as a contractor, 
        when I register a TRADE product ticket (ExcludeDuplicateChecks = FALSE) and
         if john@example.com registers, it should ALLOW that registration because the set we are comparing to will exclude john@example.com that is on a CONTRACTOR product
    Cart Abandonment step on first page
        If all products being purchased have ExcludeDuplicateChecks=TRUE then don't check for duplicates. eg If I'm getting 2 x Contractor passes and contractor has ExcludeDuplicateChecks=TRUE then no need to cehck for duplicates.
        If any of the products being purchased have ExcludeDuplicateChecks=FALSE then check for duplicates.  eg If I'm getting 2 x contractor passes and 1 x TRADE pass and Trade pass is ExcludeDuplicateChecks=False then we need to check for duplicates

The above examples are assuming that duplicate checks are turned on the survey level.

Name: Export session data for all theatre scanners
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #10 11/6 to 17/6
Notes:
This needs to be done on the date (which is Monday morning after show finishes)

Same as task from previous event https://app.asana.com/1/423688738683911/project/1204895581061904/task/1204895582214358?focus=true

Admin Link https://admin.lup.com.au/Event/EventDetail/2528

Extract the data from https://admin.lup.com.au/Survey/SurveyQuestions/56685?eventID=2528 session scanner so operations can tag with session codes (confirmed by organiser) and then import this back into Universal Report.

Example query for Dev

-- Export Theatre scans and also include ticket order data, and allow for unregistered visitors
-- 1328 / 18968 / 18967
-- Theatre scanner export - de-duplicate

-- Export a list of visitors who scanned in theatres at an event
-- Note the surveyttitle where clauses is like '%session%'  change as required
declare @surveyID integer
declare @eventID integer
declare @OffSet integer

-- Set @surveyID = 40331
Set @eventID = 2183
set @offset = 600  --60 x hours



-- USE THIS ONE
-- with productCode that they scanned with
SELECT       SurveyTitle,  '' as [Session Code (10 chars)], DATEADD(minute, @offset,DATEADD(minute, DATEDIFF(minute, 0, SaveTime), 0)) as calcSave, Answer.Longcode,
             Visitor.FirstName, Visitor.LastName, Visitor.Email, Visitor.Phone, Visitor.PostCode, Visitor.Position, Visitor.Company, Visitor.VisitorStatus,
                         TicketProducts.TicketProductCode as BadgeType, tickets.eventID,
                         ticketordername, ticketorderemail, ticketorderphone, ticketordercompany
FROM            Answer INNER JOIN
                         Survey ON Answer.SurveyID = Survey.SurveyID
                    INNER JOIN Tickets ON answer.longcode = Tickets.TicketLongCode
                                            INNER JOIN
                         TicketOrderProducts ON Tickets.TicketID = TicketOrderProducts.TicketID INNER JOIN
                         TicketProducts ON TicketOrderProducts.TicketProductID = TicketProducts.TicketProductID
     left outer JOIN Visitor ON tickets.visitorID=visitor.visitorID
inner join ticketorders on ticketorders.ticketorderID = tickets.ticketorderID
WHERE         (tickets.EventID = @eventID) and surveytitle like 'sess%' and survey.eventID=@eventID
ORDER BY  surveytitle, Answer.SaveTime, badgetype

neeshil@lup.events

Title of the task:
Fix App scanned Lup.bz barcodes

Due Date:
May 18, 2025

Priority:
Urgent - 24 hours turnaround

Event Code:
2505 Hutch Boat Show Auckland

Description:
Relates to exhibitor SENATOR at the event but other's may be impacted
https://admin.lup.com.au/ScanMode/ScanSurvey/54958


On android app there were scans of Lup.bz barcodes on older version of app.  This version did not parse the lup.bz into proper longcode

Can you please update answer.longcode and answer.shortcode to show these properly so they can download on the CSV?

Rough example query (please check




select survey.surveyID, survey.surveytitle, answerID, barcode, longcode, right(answer.longcode, 32) as New_Answer_LongCode, ticketshortcode as New_Answer_Barcode  from answer
inner join survey on survey.surveyID=answer.surveyID
inner join tickets on tickets.ticketlongcode =                   right(answer.longcode, 32) and tickets.eventID=2496
 where survey.eventID=2496
and answer.longcode like 'https://lup.bz%'

Name: Admin: Packs : ability to specify Upgrade packs
Tags: Dev Team Request,ACCEPTED (Dev Team Request),BAU #3 23-29 April
Notes:
Email address:
neeshil@lup.events

Title of the task:
Admin: Packs : ability to specify Upgrade packs

Due Date:
Apr 30, 2025

Priority:
Normal

Event Code:
2510 SXSW

Description:
We now have a new table of PackUpgrades.

Can we have something in admin that lets us:
* Set these up on a pack basis (either the 'parent' side of this and/or the 'child' side
* Download a master list of all of these, which should also include any packs that exist that do not have any upgrade options (ie left join)


select u.OriginalPackId, p.TicketPackName, u.UpgradePackID, pp.TicketPackName
from PackUpgrades u
inner join TicketPacks p on p.ticketpackid = u.OriginalPackID
inner join TicketPacks pp on pp.TicketPackID = u.UpgradePackID
where p.eventid = 2540 and pp.eventid=2540
order by p.ticketpackname, p.ticketpackID, pp.ticketpackname
